tha-ap23:6.3: Pavattaṃva supātāhaṃ → pavattapaṇḍupattāni (bj) | pavattañca supātāhaṃ (s2, s3) | pavattapaṇḍupattāhaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap23:11.2: yadā puttaṃ → sadā yuttaṃ (bj, pts1) | yadā yuttaṃ (s2) | dayā yuttaṃ (s3)
tha-ap23:14.3: Saddhādhuraṃ vahisi → saddhādhuraṃ jahasi (bj) | sīghaṃ dhuraṃ vahisi (s2, s3) | saddhādhuraṃ pāhisi (pts1)
tha-ap23:21.4: jhāyissasi → jhāpessasi (bj) | yāyissati (s2, s3) | neva yāyasi (pts1)
